Player History
Drafted in 3rd round, 61st overall pick, by Seattle in 2011...
Injured on 8/26/2017 with a Knocked Out Teeth, out for 2 days...
Had first career hit on 5/9/2018, off Jed Bradley (TEX)...
Hit first career homerun on 6/22/2018, off David Herndon (LAA)...
Traded from Seattle to Boston on 4/1/2020 (Going to SEA: RF J. Puñal, RF B. Mazzella. Going to BOS: C B. Swihart)...
Injured on 7/20/2021 with a Dislocated Shoulder, out for 2-3 weeks...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/24/2022, hitting .611 with 3 HR, 10 RBI...
